tool_description:
The ExerciseDB gives you access to over 1300 exercises with individual exercise data and animated demonstrations.

Please visit https://v2.exercisedb.io/docs for full API documentation.
name: ExerciseDB
title: ExerciseDB

api_list.name: /status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exercisedb.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exercisedb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /exercises/bodyPart/{bodyPart}
api_list.description: Return list of exercises based on body part
